name: Baker Street Advertising
description:
Baker Street Advertising is a full-service, integrated advertising, brand management and marketing investigation agency in San Francisco.
Named for Sherlock Holmes' legendary office address, we discover hidden truths that unlock your brand's future. Truths the untrained eye often overlooks.
The secret to our success is a merger between an award-winning advertising agency and an innovative consumer insights and data analytics firm.
The result?
Creative work that works. And we can prove it.
READ MORE...
